AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals suspected of crossing the border illegally, potentially traveling and being stopped based on appearance and other slight circumstances, found in a pickup truck camper with unwashed and unkempt occupants, attempting to hide from view when approached by United States Border Patrol, reacting physically to the beam of a flashlight, including ducking and scrambling in response to a bright light, carried in large numbers such as twenty-two people
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck camper: vehicle stopped by United States Border Patrol on Interstate Highway 35, containing undocumented aliens and searched based on probable cause, with fogged windows suggesting living cargo, and noted to be carrying an apparent heavy load, where occupants were observed reacting to a flashlight and scrambling in the interior to avoid detection, exhibiting signs of overloading such as weaving and angled headlights
